message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm aiming for a price point closer to $800,000.  Would you be open to discussing this further?

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. I am proposing to offer the product at $850,000. This price still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being more flexible in our pricing strategy. I look forward to your feedback on this proposal.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be completely transparent, my budget allows for $820,000. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to finalize the purchase today.
